#BlackMagicCraft #Episode218 #warhammer

Thanks to 1985 Games for sponsoring this video!
COUNTERSPELL MINIATURES KICKSTARTER: https://bit.ly/CSpellMINIS

The base I purchased and used: http://www.mmf.io/o/137124

I don't like the Games Workshop Helbrute model. I think it looks pretty dumb. It's OK if you like it, but I don't. So I decided to turn it into something I DO like in the most involved miniature conversion I've done yet!

title: 12 Things I Learned Making a Lame Warhammer Model Look AWESOME!
